alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 10:00AM CDT until November 05 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR EASTERN PUTNAM AND NORTHEASTERN BUREAU COUNTIES... At 1000 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Nachusa to near Standard, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hennepin, Spring Valley, DePue, Granville, Ladd, La Moille, Dalzell, McNabb, Mark, Cherry, Seatonville, Magnolia, Standard, Arlington, Hollowayville, Spring Valley Airport, Zearing, Ottville, Van Orin and Florid. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
